doc.name: VariableRecursiveLattice
doc.description: This actor implements a recursive (all-pole) filter with a lattice structure where the reflection coefficients are supplied at an input port. The blockSize parameter specifies the number of inputs of the filter that are processed per coefficient set provided on the newCoefficients input. If no coefficients are provided on that input port, then the default coefficients defined in the base class are used. In all other respects, the behavior of this actor is the same as that of the base class.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
doc.port: The input for new coefficient values. The type is an array of doubles.
doc.property: The number of inputs that use each each coefficient set. This is an integer that defaults to 1.
The number of tokens consumed from the input port.
The number of tokens produced from the output port.
